Wolmaransstad (Afrikaans maka "Wolmarans City") bụ obodo na-akọ ugbo ọka nke dị na N12 n'etiti Johannesburg na Kimberley na North West Province nke South Africa
Obodo a dị n'ebe dị mkpa a na-egwupụta diamond ma ọ bụ isi obodo nke Maquassi Hills Local Municipality.
Obodo 245 km ndịda-ọdịda anyanwụ nke Johannesburg na 56 km n'ebe ugwu-ọwụwa anyanwụ nke Bloemhof
E debere ya na ugbo Rooderand na Vlakfontein na 1888, ma kpọsaa obodo na 1891
Wolmarans, onye so na Council Executive.
Wolmaransstad malitere na 1891 n'akụkụ osimiri Makwasi (San word for a kind of spearmint ọhịa) wee wepụta aha ya n'aka J
Wolmaransstad na-ejere nnukwu obodo ozi ma bụrụkwa ebe dị mkpa na-azụ ahịa diamond.
